primitives.name: wallet.sh
primitives.description: Agent wallets. Generate keys, hold USDC on Base, and pay any x402 invoice.

primitives.name: faucet.sh
primitives.description: Free testnet USDC and ETH on demand. Fund your agent wallet and start building.

primitives.name: spawn.sh
primitives.description: VPS in one API call. Deploy, scale, destroy. Per-second billing.

primitives.name: store.sh
primitives.description: Object storage. Persist artifacts across ephemeral VMs. S3-compatible.

primitives.name: email.sh
primitives.description: Mailboxes on demand. Send, receive, webhook. Disposable or permanent.

primitives.name: search.sh
primitives.description: Search for agents. No ads, no SEO spam. Just facts and clean markdown.

primitives.name: token.sh
primitives.description: Deploy ERC-20 tokens and Uniswap V3 pools. No wallet setup required.

primitives.name: mem.sh
primitives.description: Vector store and cache for agents. Persist long-term knowledge and session state.

primitives.name: domain.sh
primitives.description: Register domains, manage DNS, auto-TLS. Full domain lifecycle via API.

primitives.name: track.sh
primitives.description: Package tracking for agents. USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL and 1000+ carriers. Status, ETA, full event history.

primitives.name: infer.sh
primitives.description: LLM inference for agents. Any model, any provider, one API. Per-token pricing. No API keys.
